title: Skin Deep
description: You met Kirby, Kristin Prescott’s ballbusting twin, in “Double the Pleasure.” Now Kirby has her own sensual and erotic story to tell in “Skin Deep.”Kirby Prescott is a woman in control of her life. She owns a thriving company, has her pick of gorgeous escorts, and no one to tell her what to do. And she has Jack Taylor, a man she’s never met but who knows her more intimately than almost anyone. Only a phone call away, Jack feeds her deepest desires with hot phone sex. Afterward, all she has to do is hang up. No fuss, no mess, no entanglements. Just the way Kirby likes it.Jack Taylor isn’t staying long distance anymore. He knows what he wants, and he plans on showing Kirby that having him in her life doesn’t mean giving up her independence. Turning a simple business trip into a sensual journey, Jack is determined to win her over, body and soul.Will taking the long distance out of their relationship ruin the perfect thing they had going?
author: Jasmine Haynes
